content: [TextBlock(text="[2025 | Age 22] Just got a smart wearable health monitor as a gift. It's fascinating how it predicts my stress levels before I even feel it. Took a walk around Tokyo, the AI assistant in my apartment back in Bangkok adjusted the lights to mimic the sunrise I described, creating a serene environment. Thinking about Z, I wonder what he'd say about all this tech. He always had a way of making the mundane magical. Feels like he's still here, guiding me through this ever-changing world.", type='text')]
